channel.title: Evil king lost vs reaper
channel.description:
#### What happened? 3 people alive: the princess, the reaper, the evil king the reaper then reaps the princess next day the reaper automatically wins
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? The king should be able to point the finger at the reaper and win the game. the body of the princess is still around so its not even a 1v1 per se like the 1v1 mastermind good king bug i reported before.
#### Steps to reproduce: Get evil king, reaper, and a bd as last ones alive. then reap the bd.
#### Comments: Hope this is addressed and fixed quickly, interactions like these rob the king of a guaranteed win. I really hope this isn't a feature either.

item.title: Evil king lost vs reaper
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
So the princess death is not announced?

Read full topic

item.title: Evil king lost vs reaper
item.dc:creator: brockvond
item.description:
The king wasn’t dead. He could have voted up the reaper REGARDLESS of reaper bypassing immunity because he was alive the day of the princess’ reap. However, the game ended right after the princess was reaped, so king didnt even have a chance to vote.
Source: I was king

Read full topic

item.title: Evil king lost vs reaper
item.dc:creator: Aurelia
item.description:
I believe so. He can bypass immunity, so. if the king can’t vote during the day; or doesn’t catch him during the day. then I imagine that the game will register the king as dead ??? or as “Unable to win”

perhaps the king would be able to Vote however a glitch caused the king to lose automatically? I’m not certain

Read full topic

item.description:
Am I looking the report correctly?

Read full topic

item.title: Evil king lost vs reaper
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
Sounds to me indeed that Princess may have been reaped beforehand and have enough souls to use Gathering Darkness at day before Princess ends up dead next morning.

That way, even King’s guard doesn’t have chance.

Read full topic

I guess they changed it for the Reaper now

item.title: Evil king lost vs reaper
item.dc:creator: brockvond
item.description:
What happened?

3 people alive: the princess, the reaper, the evil king
the reaper then reaps the princess
next day the reaper automatically wins

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

The king should be able to point the finger at the reaper and win the game. the body of the princess is still around so its not even a 1v1 per se like the 1v1 mastermind good king bug i reported before.

Steps to reproduce:

Get evil king, reaper, and a bd as last ones alive. then reap the bd.

Comments:

Hope this is addressed and fixed quickly, interactions like these rob the king of a guaranteed win. I really hope this isn’t a feature either.

Read full topic
